fandb_description: Join Vollkorn as we step into the metaverse.
playlern_content3: Play games to earn rewards every day.
fncoin_description: Foodverse Coin is the main currency in the F&B metaverse world.{br}Earn them daily and spend them on amazing benefits!
foodverse_description_pc: Be part of a unique food and beverage experience led by the best new brands. Come join us in Foodverse, the first metaverse platform for F&B brands!
foodverse_description_mobile: Be part of a unique food and beverage experience led by the best new brands. Come join us in Foodverse, the first metaverse platform for F&B brands!
benefit_section_footer1: * 1 random plate giveaway out of 4 kinds of 6 inch size
stamp_top_title: 100% guaranteed! Collect SMILE stamps every day{br}and earn free Vollkorn merch!
stamp_notion_list: Smile Stamping is limited to one per person per day.$Smile Stamping may be shut down or changed without prior notice.$When you complete all seven smile stamps, you can receive merch at any Vollkorn branch. (except Cheonho, Songdo, Gimpo, and Gumi branches)$Re-entry in the same Smile stamping is not possible after completing.$You cannot participate in the 2nd round Smile stamping until you receive a glass merch for the 1st round Smile stamping.$If you participate in an unusual way, the merch may be canceled.
stamp_board_none_stamp: 1st round Smile Stamping completion is needed.
stamp_board_none_stamp_description: (Available after receiving the can shaped glass)
stamp_way_1: Collect Smile Stamp once a day
stamp_way_3: Collect all 7 stamps,{br}and receive Vollkorn merch!
roulette_title: Spin the wheel and{br}win coins once every day!
roulette_notion_list: Smile Roulette is limited to one per account per day.$Smile Roulette may be shut down or changed without prior notice.$Coins acquired through Smile Roulette can be used similarly to cash through Online Shop and Smart Order, which will be opened later.$Coins acquired through Smile Roulette can be used from 5,000 to 10,000 won.$If you participate in an unusual way, the coins may be canceled.
footer_company_address_pc: 37 Bongeunsa-ro 16-gil, Gangnam-gu, Seoul, Republic of Korea | Business Registration No.177-88-00119 | E-commerce Permit 2021-Seoul Gangnam-00540 | Email : help_cartverse@marvrus.com
footer_company_address_mobile: 37 Bongeunsa-ro 16-gil, Gangnam-gu, Seoul, Republic of Korea{br}Business Registration No.177-88-00119{br}E-commerce Permit 2021-Seoul Gangnam-00540{br}Email : help_cartverse@marvrus.com
popup_logout: ​Are you sure you want to log out?
popup_staff_auth_fail:
The verification code is incorrect.
Please re-enter.
popup_staff_message1: 1.  When picking up a drink, show the current screen to the Vollkorn staff.
popup_staff_message2: 1. When exchanging the Smile Stamping benefit, show the current screen to the Vollkorn staff.
popup_staff_message3: 2. When the staff enters the verification code, it is done!
popup_staff_message4: Event operating stores: All branches (except Cheonho, Songdo, Gimpo, and Gumi branches)
signup-header-des: ​​Sign up now and try various services.
nft-login-cs-text: Please contact us via CS Email if you have lost your ID or password.
signup-not-over-fourteen: Sign up for under 14 years old
signup-over-fourteen: Sign up for 14 years old and older
signup-pass-content-des1: To sign up for MEEMZ, you need to verify your identity.
signup-pass-content-des2: * For customers under the age of 14, consent of a parent(legal guardian) is required when registering.
signup-pass-content-des3: You can verify with the guardian's mobile phone. (You can create up to 3 MEEMZ accounts with one parental consent.)
signup-pass-content-des4: You agree to the collection of mobile phone verification information under the guardian's name for membership registration for children under the age of 14.
signup-agreement-all: Agree to all integrated member terms and conditions of MARVRUS Co., Ltd.
signup-agreement-overfourteen: [Required] You are 14 years old or older.
signup-agreement-servicePolicy: [Required] MARVRUS Co., Ltd. Integrated Member Terms and Conditions
signup-agreement-marketingPolicy: [Optional] MARVRUS Co., Ltd. Agree to the PR/marketing promotion
signup-agreement-nightNotiAgree: ​[Optional] Consent to receive nighttime advertisement for the MEEMZ app
validation-id-text-role: 5~20 letters, numbers, and special symbols (only (-) and (_)) can be used.
validation-pw-text-role: 8 to 20 characters including English, numbers, and at least one special character.
validation-pw-not-matched-role: The new password does not match.
signup-complete-des2: Try a variety of services right now.
re-check-password-description: To keep your personal information safe, please re-enter your password.
alert_msg_under_14yearsold: Members under the age of 14 cannot edit your personal information.
alert_msg_check_dupl_email: Please check your email for duplicates.
alert_msg_check_dupl_nickname: Please check your nickname for duplicates.
alert_msg_not_done_passAuth:
Identity verification was unsuccessful.
Please try again.
alert_msg_already_exits_passAuth: You already have a verified ID.
alert_msg_failed_edit_userInfo:
Unsuccessful to edit your personal information.
Please try again.
alert_msg_notice_add_userInfo:
To use the FOODVERSE service,
please enter additional personal information.
validation_nickname_length: Nickname has to be a minimum of 2 characters and a maximum of 8 characters.
validation_nickname_use_role: Please use only Korean, English, and numbers for your nickname.
validation_phoneNo_only_num: Please enter only numbers for your phone number.
validation_phoneNo_length: Please enter your phone number correctly.
checkbox_marketing_receive_greement: [Optional] Receive marketing information from Marvelous Co., Ltd.

error_not_correct_curr_pw: The current password does not match.
alert_msg_failed_change_pw:

validation_pw_length: Please enter a password with a minimum of 8 characters and a maximum of 20 characters.
validation_pw_match_role: 8 to 20 characters including English, numbers, and at least one special character.
brand_introduce_title2: with the most bakeries in Korea
brand_introduce_description_pc: Vollkorn uses organic wheat, fresh cream, and natural butter and does not use ingredients that harm the essence of bread, such as shortening preservatives and food additives.{br}Based on GBM’s beans, Vollkorn’s own coffee blend is developed.{br}We aim to provide our customers with the best bread, drinks, and space by constructing an eco-friendly interior.
brand_introduce_description_mobile: Vollkorn uses organic wheat, fresh cream, and natural butter and does not use ingredients that harm the essence of bread, such as shortening preservatives and food additives. Based on GBM’s beans, Vollkorn’s own coffee blend is developed. We aim to provide our customers with the best bread, drinks, and space by constructing an eco-friendly interior.
brand_introduce_content_1_2: produced and sold on the same day
brand_store_decription: We provide a comfortable environment where you can enjoy freedom and relaxation.{br}Try the Vollkorn store online now.
store_gwangyo_location: 9th floor, Galleria Department Store Gwanggyo, 320, Gwanggyohosugongwon-ro, Yeongtong-gu, Suwon-si, Gyeonggi-do
store_nowon_location: Lotte Department Store Nowon, 4th floor, 1414, Dongil-ro, Nowon-gu, Seoul
